li.text: All XML Extensions settings require a restart to be applied!
All settings are safe to have enabled even if you don't have the appropriate mods.

li.label: Fantasy Metals Reforged - deep drilling nerf.
li.tooltip: Makes Fantasy Metals appear less when using ground-penetrating scanner, which makes vanilla materials more common. Makes lumps smaller. Those materials are very expensive, but without this patch too easy to mine and sell.

li.label: Fantasy Metals Reforged - items made from solpyrite have "solpyrite" adjective instead of "golden?"
li.tooltip: Items made from solpyrite will have "solpyrite" adjective instead of "golden?"

li.label: [LTS]Furnishing - all buildings require complex furniture research
li.tooltip: if you use no starting research, lts furnishing is strikingly powerful earlygame, especially the recreation ones, so I move all of them behind complex furniture research.

li.label: Megafauna - fix tame revenge chances being 0.28% instead of 28%.
li.tooltip: looks like a bug

li.label: RimGacha - gacha can only be desonstructed for 1 resource
li.tooltip: if you have mods that add op resources you could exploit gachas by deconstructing them.

li.label: SeedsPlease: Lite - undo vanilla changes
li.tooltip: Undoes the vanilla changes where cotton, devilstrand, healroot, and cocoa yield raw resources that must be refined to be useful. Actually if seeds plus adds any processing chains to modded items, that will be undone too.

li.label: SeedsPlease: Lite - seeds aren't eedible
li.tooltip: restricting animals from eating valuable seeds requires some annoying (imo) areas micromanagement, not worth it.

li.label: Rimsenal - defense tech research requires precision rifling
li.tooltip: its a bit op to have before other research

li.label: Super Soil - super soils dropdown
li.tooltip: because with all ideology floors the menu is getting huge

li.label: Traits Excel - some traits are rarer (Ekrixiphobia, demolitions expert, mechanic)
li.tooltip: Having the "ekrixiphobia" word show up on every second pawn breaks the immersion a bit, and the other traits are way to specific to be as common as they are.

li.label: VGP Bamboo (Standalone) - bamboo nerf
li.tooltip: VGP Bamboo has the same stats as wood, yet it is easier to plant and available before tree sowing research. With this, it will be an early game alternative inferior to wood. Most notable changes: HP 0.65>0.45; beauty offset 1>-1.

li.label: VGP Bamboo (Standalone) - make bamboo a bit more green
VGP Bamboo (Standalone) - remove "convert bamboo into wood" and "smelt bamboo into chemfuel" recipes
[WD] Expanded Floors - jade floors dropdown
li.tooltip: because with all ideology floors the menu is getting huge

li.label: Weapons From The Vault - shards are 10 times more expensive
li.tooltip: I think they were too easy to buy and craft some good weapory.

li.text: Humanoid Alien Races - those settings affect ALL HAR races:

li.label: remove custom work stats (e.g. research speed, mining yield, etc)
li.tooltip: Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/ResearchSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/MiningSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/GeneralLaborSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/ConstructSuccessChance | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/DeepDrillingSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/MiningYield | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/SmoothingSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/AnimalGatherSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/AnimalGatherYield | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/PlantWorkSpeed | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/PlantHarvestYield | Defs/AlienRace.ThingDef_AlienRace/statBases/DrugHarvestYield | li.label: remove custom shooting accuracy and aiming time
replace pain shock thresholds above 1 with 1
all races import human surgery recipes
li.tooltip: adds humanRecipeImport tag to all races, which does a basic check if there are any valid bodyparts in the body of your race before it imports.

li.label: remove all custom thoughts (thoughtSettings)
li.tooltip: every second race doesn't mind sleeping in barracks because modders are very fond of removing that particular thought from their races.

li.label: remove chemical settings (custom reactions to drugs)
give all races OmnivoreHuman diet
li.tooltip: useful when custom thoughts are disabled as some races can only eat raw food and corpses and it would be very unfortunate if they didn't like said raw food and corpses...

li.label: remove ALL race restrictions
li.tooltip: this means all races will be able to wear all apparel, use all weapons, research all researches, build all buildings, plant all plants, etc. This also means all apparel and weapons that could only be used by specific races will now be available to everyone. This also means some races that aren't meant to wear clothes will still wear them, looking weird.

li.label: remove hediff- and backstory-based graphics
li.tooltip: This doesn't fix the TryResolveGraphics patch, doesn't seem to make it any better at all.

li.text: Allows you to multiply spawning commonalitities of all animals in a mod, in all biomes, by a value you choose.
The list of mods is handpicked from ones I wanted to edit, and I can add more requested mods.

li.label: hide animal commonality settings
li.tooltip: to avoid accidental editing and unclutter the menu (doesn't disable the settings!)

li.text: Animal commonality multiplier settings are hidden.
